author: cmlenz
msg: - Make it possible to keep the JARs needed for Checkstyle code audit
outside of $ANT_HOME/lib.
- Put the relevant initialization in a buildfile fragment called common.xml,
which is included from anttasks/build.xml and framework/build.xml by
entity expansion.
- Added the build.properties at the root of the project to the build files of
both anttasks and framework... this might need some further tweaking
to be really clean

author: cmlenz
msg: Add myself to list of committers

author: cmlenz
msg: Move the AspectJ JAR properties into the optional section, where they
belong.

author: cmlenz
msg: Make the dependancy on the AspectJ explicit, and let the user set the
location of the required JARs.

author: cmlenz
msg: - Introduced a new factory method ServiceEnumeration.valueOf(String)
that returns the enumeration instance corresponding to the service
name. This can be used to retrieve the instance for identity comparison.
- Deprecated ServiceEnumeration.equals(String), and added final
implementations of equals(Object) and hashCode() that delegate to the
java.lang.Object implementation, so that they always operate on object
identity.
- Updated AbstractWebTestCaller to use ServiceEnumeration.valueOf()
and identity comparison instead of ServiceEnumeration.equals(String)
